data.name: Splitgate - Gold Edition
data.detailed_description:
Start your Splitgate journey with the first EXCLUSIVE Legendary character offered in Splitgate. Strike fear in the hearts of your enemies as you dominate the arena with one of the most intimidating characters in the Splitgate universe.

The Splitgate - Gold Edition includes:

  • Paladin Valiant - Exclusive Legendary Character Skin
  • Valiant - Matching Exclusive Jetpack
  • Rift - Exclusive Legendary Portal
  • Exclusive Banner
  • Exclusive Spray

*All skins sold in Splitgate are cosmetic-only, and offer no gameplay advantage.

data.short_description: Start your Splitgate journey with the first EXCLUSIVE Legendary character offered in Splitgate.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Russian, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Any dual core CPU
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
